sections.text:
Title XXXVII CRIMINAL PROCEDURE

Chapter 551

551.150. Insolvency relief law not applicable (St. Louis). â€”No person convicted in the circuit court of the city of St. Louis of a misdemeanor under the laws of this state, and sentenced to the payment of a fine, and the costs therein accrued, shall be allowed to avail himself of the provisions of any law for the relief of insolvents confined on criminal process.

(L. 1978 H.B. 1634)

Effective 1-02-79
